parameter-group.label: Zigbee2Mqtt Server
parameter-group.description: The Zigbee2Mqtt server represents a bridge with general settings and communication tasks.

parameter.name: mqttbrokerIpAddress

parameter.description: The IP address or hostname of the MQTT-Broker. If MQTT-Broker and openHAB are running on the same machine, the default value can be used.
